rule: If the word provided in the input can be matched to one of the listed part of speech tags, return only the corresponding tag as the output, with no additional text or formatting.
input: Sentence: A large tree fell. Word: large
complianceText:
The chatbot output provided is "JJ". According to the description, the task is to return the part of speech tag for a given word from a sentence, and the specified tags are listed in the description. "JJ" is one of the listed tags and represents "Adjective". Therefore, the output is in compliance with the description as it provides a part of speech tag that is directly listed among the permissible tags. There is no additional text or elements that deviate from the requirement of providing just a tag.

No violation.
OK
